sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import propTypes from "prop-types" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
{/*
*/}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { //this generates an error if numbers are entered in title or about title: propTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText: propTypes.string.isRequired, } Navbar.defaultProps = { //displayed when no title or about us is passed title: "Set title here", aboutText: "About", }
